actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the excise tax on trucks and tractors and parts and accessories for such vehicles.
short_title: Motor Vehicle Tax Repeal Act of 1981

summary.text: Motor Vehicle Tax Repeal Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the excise tax on the sale of trucks, tractors, and parts and accessories for such vehicles. Permits the refund or crediting of taxes paid by the manufacturer, producer, or importer on items sold after January 1, 1981.

titles.title: Motor Vehicle Tax Repeal Act of 1981
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the excise tax on trucks and tractors and parts and accessories for such vehicles.
